message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. It's a fantastic deal for you, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for your business. Let me know what you think!
Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I can only pay up to $1,300,000. I hope this proposal works for you.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I need to be closer to $1,400,000 to make this deal work. Let's meet in the middle at $1,350,000. This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident it will be a mutually beneficial agreement.
